flawed_nl_solution:
Each pan costs $10 to make so for 20 pans, it will cost 10*20 = $<<10*20=200>>200
She sells each of the 20 pans for $25 each so she will make 20*25 = $<<20*25=5000>>5000
She makes $5000 and spent $200 on ingredients so she makes 5000-200 = $<<5000-200=4800>>4800
#### 4800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
